name: Website Redesign
description: Redesign a company website to be modern, responsive, and user-friendly. The website should have a clean design, fast loading times, and be optimized for mobile devices.

name: Blockchain Smart Contract
description: Develop a secure smart contract for a new crypto token. The contract should include features like token minting, burning, and transfers with proper security measures.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Create a cross-platform mobile app for a fitness tracking system. The app should track workouts, nutrition, and provide personalized recommendations.

name: E-commerce Platform Integration
description: Integrate payment gateways and shipping APIs into an existing e-commerce site. The integration should support multiple payment methods and shipping providers.

name: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Build an interactive dashboard to visualize business analytics data. The dashboard should include charts, graphs, and filters for exploring the data.

name: AI Chatbot Implementation
description: Implement an AI-powered chatbot for customer support. The chatbot should be able to answer FAQs and route complex inquiries to human agents.

name: Social Media Marketing Campaign
description: Design and execute a comprehensive social media marketing campaign for a product launch. The campaign should include content creation, scheduling, and performance tracking.

name: Backend API Development
description: Develop a RESTful API for a mobile application. The API should handle user authentication, data storage, and business logic.
